thread.section_title: SaratogaWine.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SaratogaWine.com | www.saratogawine.com
thread.title: Randy Holliday

author: Randy Holliday
title: Randy Holliday
text:
After waiting a very, very long time for Wiston (UK) sparkling wine to find distribution in the US, I was delighted to find the 2011 Rose at Saratoga. For whatever reason this wine isn't at retail in California as far as i can tell.
My wife and I have tasted this wine with the winemaker at the winery in West Sussex. Superb sparkling wine in our opinion.
Ordering online was easy and smooth. As requested Saratoga held the wine for about 10 days after I ordered to comply with my ship date need. Wine went out on the day i asked for and made it to California in good order. A very satisfying experience all around.
